titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of October 28, 2019, as "Honoring the Nation's First Responders Day".
A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of October 28, 2019, as "Honoring the Nation's First Responders Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson without amendment and with a preamble. With written report No. 116-43.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 108.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of October 28, 2019, as Honoring the Nation's First Responders Day.
